well, Frank let them have thier fun. I personally think they S UC K ! Its a forum for paranormal , AS LONG AS IT FITS THIER IDEAS! Funny, i didnt know that you could control the paranormal or people. BUT the high n might people over there at grass harp seem to think so!
  Thats why i left! 
  You dont post exactly the words, thought, ideas, parnormal etc etc etc that they like ! You dont get to post
  NOW THATS SUMMMM BULLSHIT!

Frank
